@junior wrote:

This script will not run… its severely outdated. Check the SRL version its 2.2, were on 3.4 now and pretty soon 3.5. If by any chance you got this script to run…instant ban.

Buy a guildminer from the Script sales section here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

~jR

PS: wrong forum

item.title: [error]in this guild miner i got from another site help plz [error]
item.dc:creator: @M4G3OWNS M4G3OWNS
item.description:
@M4G3OWNS wrote:

ok i get this error
Line 64: [Error] (14946:1): colon (’:’) expected in script
ok and heres the script i just dont get this error
[scar] {=========================================================================]
[ SRL Guildminer 0.31. ]
[ ]
[ NAME : SRL Guildminer 0.31 ]
[ WRITER : Stupid3ooo, heavy modded by WT-Fakawi ]
[ CATEGORY : Miner ]
[ DESCRIPTION : See below. ]
[ USAGE : Miner/banker for coal ]
[ AUTOCOLOR : YES ]
[ SRL REV. : SRL Version 2.2 ]
[ NOTES : STAND @ LEFTMOST BANKSLOT ]
[ FACE MM PERFECT NORTH. ]
[=========================================================================]
| Description: |
| A macro that mines a full load of coal and mith in the miner’s guild, |
| then banks it in the east Falador bank. | |
| Instructions: |
| 1.Set the Runescape brightness to V-bright, and your computer’s |
| resolution to 32bit resolution. |
| 2.Need SCAR version 2.0.3. |
| 3.Start script in the Falador eastern bank. |
| 4.Start with a pickaxe in your fist inventory slot or equiped. |
| 5.Recomended to have extra pickaxes in your first bank slot. |
| 6.Click and drag the crosshair over the Runescape client. |
Then press the green arrow. |
| 7.START @ FALADOR EASTBANK LEFTMOST BANKSLOT FACE MM PERFECTLY NORTH |
[=========================================================================}

program SRLGuildMiner;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/Mining.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/misc/FaladorColorFinder.scar}

Const StartPlayer = 1;
Const Loads = 1; // Number of loads before switching user.

Const MSGasColor1 = 8101281; // New gas color.
Const MSGasColor2 = 9218480; // New gas color.
Const MSGasColor3 = 4417137; // New gas color.

const CoalOre = 2438711; // CoalOre is a constant
Const MithOre = 7425100; // Mithril is a constant

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
Const VersionNumber = ‘0.31’;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

var MapPickColor,MapOreColor,LadderColor,TheOre,OreWait,
TotalOres,MaxWait:integer;

var FB1,FB2,FB3: Integer; // BankerDTMs (Yellow dots at three angles: -10,0,+10 degrees)
RoadWalk // For use with DTM3Flag that plants a flag when any of 3 DTM’s is found

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

Procedure FillMem:; // 3 yellow dot bankers @ different angle
begin

FB1 := DTMFromString(‘78DA636C66626008634001972E5E66F80FA41’ +
‘981F83F1030B601D5C4A0AAF9F38789810BAA0604189B8850D345’ +
‘580D00CA7B110D’);
FB2 := DTMFromString(‘78DA63EC61626008614001478F1E65F80FA41’ +
‘981F83F1030F602D544A1AAF9F38789810BAA0604182712A1662A’ +
‘504D247E3500C2961107’);
FB3 := DTMFromString(‘78DA636C646260086140038C0CFFC12403C37’ +
‘F206004A9894255F1E70F130317540D58472B504D3401359D4035’ +
‘31F8D50000978B0E8E’);
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

procedure Setup;
begin
SetupSRL;
SetUpSRLMining;
FillMem;
EquipPick:= True; // Wielding.
PickUpItems:=True; // to pick up random items when pickhead is gone.
DeclarePlayers;
CurrentPlayer:=StartPlayer;
LoginPlayer; // logs in the first player.
MaxWait:= 10; // Maximum time in seconds to wait while mining a rock.
GasColor:= 8166047; //Reference color of gas.
BenMouse:=True;
MouseSpeed:=20;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

procedure PlayerStats;

var Active: string;
var i: Integer;
begin
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’ ');
writeln(‘’);
writeln('Name : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].Name);
writeln('Number : '+inttostr(CurrentPlayer));
writeln('Mining Level : '+ inttostr(Players[CurrentPlayer].level[15]));
writeln(‘Worked for : ‘+IntToStr(Players[CurrentPlayer].Worked)+’ minutes.’);
writeln('Banked : ‘+ inttostr(Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked) + ’ times.’);
if Players[CurrentPlayer].Active=True then Active:=‘True’ else Active:=‘False’;
writeln('Active : '+ Active);
writeln('Location : '+ Players[CurrentPlayer].loc);
writeln('’);

for i := 0 to HowManyPlayers-1 do
begin
if Players[i].Active=True then Active:=‘True’ else Active:=‘False’;
writeln( (inttostr(i))+’ : '+Players[i].name+ ’ = '+Active+
‘.- Lvl : ‘+inttostr(Players[i].level[15])+
‘.- B :’+inttostr(Players[i].Banked)+’ Times.’+
‘.- A: ‘+IntToStr(Players[i].Worked)+’ mins.’+
‘.- Loc: ‘+Players[i].loc);
end
writeln(’**********************************************’);
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’<============== -’+VersionNumber+’- Progress Report ===============>’);
writeln(‘Worked for ‘+ TimeRunning);
WriteLn(‘Banked ‘+IntToStr(banks)+’ loads[s].’);
WriteLn(‘Banked ‘+IntToStr(TotalOres)+’ Ores.’);
WriteLn(’<=====================================================>’);
PlayerStats;
SRLRandomsReport;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

function FindMapOreColor:integer;
var
MapOre,MapOre2:integer;
begin
MapOre := BitmapFromString(3, 3,
‘3D2C345948546D5D624A39416D5D626D5D625948546D5D626D5D62’ +
‘’);
MapOre2 := BitmapFromString(3, 3,
‘061115222D35364243131E22364243364243222D35364243364243’ +
‘’);
if(FindBitmapsProgressiveTol(MapOre,MapOre2,0,0,0,65,5,587,41,705,118))then
Result:=GetColor(x+1,y+1);
Freebitmap(MapOre);
Freebitmap(MapOre2);
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

Function FindFaladorLadderColor: Integer;
var C,TX,TY,FaladorLadder:integer;

begin
FaladorLadder:= BitmapFromString(2, 2, ‘4F1F004F1F004F1F00’ +
‘A4A298’);

while (C<100) do
begin
C:=C+5;
If FindBitMapToleranceIn(FaladorLadder,TX,TY,650,144,664,156,C) then
begin
LadderColor:=GetColor(TX,TY);
Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc:=‘Falador’;
Result:=LadderColor;
writeln('LadderColor = '+IntToStr(LadderColor));
break;
end
end
FreeBitMap(FaladorLadder);
if Result = 0 then begin writeln(‘ERROR: LadderColor NOT Found’); TerminateScript end;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

function Underground:boolean;
begin
if((FindColoredAreaTolerance(x,y,256,570,5,725,162,50,1)))then
begin
Result:=true;
end;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

function FindStraightGas: boolean;
var gx,gy:integer;
begin
if( (FindColorSpiralTolerance(gx,gy,MSGasColor1,gx-50,gy-50,gx+50,gx+50,5)) or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(gx,gy,MSGasColor2,gx-50,gy-50,gx+50,gx+50,5)) or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(gx,gy,MSGasColor3,gx-50,gy-50,gx+50,gx+50,5)))
then
result:=True;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

procedure ToCenter;
begin
if(FindColorSpiral(x,y,MapPickColor,570,63,725,160))then
begin
Mouse(x-10,y-10,20,20,true);
FFlag(20);
Wait(1000+Random(100));
end else
begin
if(FindColorSpiral(x,y,MapPickColor,570,63,725,160))then
begin
Mouse(x-10,y-10,20,20,true);
FFlag(20);
Wait(1000+Random(100));
end;
end;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

procedure RunAway;
begin
if(UnderGround)then
begin
ClickMMColor(LadderColor);
FFlag(10)
end else
RunTo(‘N’,False);
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

procedure FindRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
if(FindFight)then RunAway;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

function HandleGas:Boolean;
var gx, gy:integer;
begin
if FindGas(gx,gy) then
begin
ToCenter;
Result:=True;
end;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

Function ClimbLadderDown:Boolean;
var
c:integer;
begin
for c:=1 to 50 do
begin
Wait(100);
if FindObj(x,y,‘adder’,2642801,100) then
begin
Wait(100);
Mouse(x,y,0,0,false);
if ChooseOption(x,y,‘Climb’) then
begin
MarkTime(Mark);
repeat
Wait((1000)+Random(1000));
If TimeFromMark(Mark)>30000 then begin Logout; Exit; end;
until ((GetColor(580,80)=0) and (GetColor(648,142)=0));
Result:=True;
Exit;
end;
end;
c:=C+1;
SendArrowSilentWait((Random(2)*2)+1, 20 + Random(10));
if C=50 then begin Logout; exit end;
end;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

Function ClimbLadderUp:Boolean;
var
c:integer;
begin
for c:=1 to 50 do
begin
Wait(100);
if FindObj(x,y,‘adder’,2775161,21) then
begin
Wait(100);
Mouse(x,y,0,0,false);
if ChooseOption(x,y,‘Climb’) then
begin
MarkTime(Mark);
repeat
Wait((1000)+Random(1000));
If TimeFromMark(Mark)>30000 then begin Logout; Exit; end;
until FindColor(x,y,WaterColor,MMX1,MMY1,MMX2,MMY2);
Result:=True;
Exit;
end;
end;
c:=C+1;
if C=50 then begin Logout; exit end;
SendArrowSilentWait((Random(2)*2)+1, 20 + Random(10));
end;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

procedure BankToGuild;
var xblack,yblack:Integer;
begin
PerfectNorth;
MouseFindFlag(690,110,1,-1);
Flag;
LinearRoadWalk(RoadColor, 180,60,0,-1)
FindColor(xblack,yblack,0,MMX1,MMCY-30,MMX2,MMY2);
Mouse(xblack-5,yblack+10,0,0,true);
Flag;
ClimbLadderDown;
Players[CurrentPlayer].loc:=‘Guild’;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

procedure GuildToBank; // improved walking. Stable now.
var
c:integer;
begin

repeat
  if FindMMColor(x, y, LadderColor) then break;
  c:=c+1;
  RadialWalk(MapOreColor,210,270,50,-1,0);
until(FindMMColor(x, y, LadderColor))or(c>50)
IdleTime(3000, 1000, 1.0);
ClickMMColor(LadderColor);
Flag;
Wait(500+Random(500));
ClimbLadderUp;
PerfectNorth;

RoadColorChecker;

MouseFindFlag(666,45,-1,-1);
Flag;
MarkTime(Mark);
Repeat
    if not(Loggedin) then break;
    if(TimeFromMark(Mark)>120000) then begin Logout; Exit; end;
    Wait(1000);
    FindRandoms;
    LinearRoadWalk(RoadColor,320,60,-1,1);
Until (DTM3Flag(FB1,FB2,FB3,True) or (TimeFromMark(Mark)>120000));
Flag;
Players[CurrentPlayer].loc:='Falador';

end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

Function SimpleBank:Boolean;
var sx,sy,dx,dy,Mark2,Tries:integer;
begin
SX:=MSCX; SY:=MSCY;
repeat
sx:=Sx+1;
sy:=sy+3;
MMouse(sx, sy, 0, 0);
if IsUpTextMulti(‘e Bank’,‘Booth’,‘ooth’) then
begin
GetMousePos(Dx, Dy);
Mouse(Dx, Dy, 0, 0, False);
if ChooseOption(Dx, Dy, ‘uickly’) then
begin
MarkTime(Mark2);
repeat
Wait(10);
if TimeFromMark(Mark2) > 20000 then
begin
Result:=False;
Exit;
end;
until BankScreen;
if BankScreen then
begin
Result := True;
Exit;
end;
end;
end
else
begin
wait(1);
Tries:=Tries+1;
end;
until(tries >6);
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

procedure Bank;

var LocalOres:integer;
begin
if (NoPick and EquipPick) then
begin
if InventoryFull then
begin
if(FindBitmapSpiralTolerance(Ore,x,y,559,210,735,460,25))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,5,5,false);
ChooseOption(x,y,‘Drop’);
end;
end;
GameTab(5);
Mouse(593,303,0,0,true);
Wait(Random(1000)+2000);
GameTab(4);
end;

LocalOres:=CountItemBmpTol(Ore,50);
MarkTime(Mark);

if not BankScreen then
begin
  repeat
     if (not(Loggedin)) then  Exit;
     if not SimpleBank then OpenBankQuiet('feb');
  until(BankScreen or (TimeFromMark(Mark)>60000));
end;
if(BankScreen)then
begin
  Wait(Random(2000)+200);
  FixBank;
  if(NoPick=true)then
  begin
    ClickAllItemsColorWait('All',65536,1000+Random(100));
    Wait(Random(2000)+200);
    Withdraw(1,1,1);
    Wait(Random(2000)+200);
  end else
  begin
    if(EquipPick=false)then Deposit(2,28,2);
    Wait(Random(2000)+200);
    if(EquipPick=true)then
       begin
         ClickAllItemsColorWait('All',65536,1000+Random(100));
         Wait(Random(2000)+200);
       end;
  end;
  CloseWindow;
  if(NoPick=true)and(EquipPick=true)then
  begin
    FindPickHeadColor;
    Wait(Random(1000)+200);
    ClickItemColor(hc1,true);
  end;
  Banks:=Banks+1;
  TotalOres:=TotalOres+LocalOres;
  Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked:=Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked+1;
  NoPick:=false
end;

end;

//*************************************************************************//

procedure MineSTUPID;
var
SysTime:integer;
begin
if(FindObj(x,y,‘Mine’,OreColor,5))then
begin
if(not(FindGas(x,y)))then
begin
HandleGas;
Mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
if(FlagPresent)then
begin
Flag;
Wait(500+Random(500));
end;
MarkTime(SysTime);
repeat
if(not(FindColorSpiral(x,y,TheOre,210,130,300,220)))then Break;
FindRandoms;
Wait(500+Random(500));
if (not(Loggedin)) then break;
until(not(GetColor(109,430)=0)and(not(GetColor(195,426)=0)))or
(TimeFromMark(SysTime)>=MaxWait*1000)
end;
end else ;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

procedure MyMine;
var MineTime,I:integer;
begin

for I := 1 to 2 do
begin
case I of
1: begin TheOre := CoalOre; OreWait:=6; end // this loop always prefers
2: begin TheOre := MithOre; OreWait:=20; end // mithril over coal…
end

if(FindObj(x,y,‘Mine’,TheOre,5))then
begin
if not HandleGas then
Mouse(x,y,5,0,true);
if(FlagPresent)then
begin
FFlag(20);
if Random(20)=1 then
IdleTime(1000,500,1.0)
else
Wait(1000+Random(500));
end;
FindRandoms;
FindPick;
MarkTime(MineTime);
repeat
if(not(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,TheOre,210,130,300,220,5)))then
break;
if (not(Loggedin)) then
break;
if Random(10)=1 then
IdleTime(1000,500,1.0)
else
Wait(1000+Random(500));
FindRandoms;
FindPick;
if HandleGas then break;
until(not(GetColor(109,430)=0)and(not(GetColor(195,426)=0)))or
(TimeFromMark(MineTime)>=OreWait*1000)
end else
wait(1000);
end;
end;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
//*************************** Main Loop***************************************//
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

begin
Setup;
FindFaladorLadderColor;
SymbolAccuracy:=0.4; // temporarily reduce symbolaccuracy for better symbol spotting
FindFaladorBasicColors;
SymbolAccuracy:=0.8; // set symbolacc. to default
NickNameBMP:=CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick,UpChars) // in case we started logged in aot logged out

repeat
GetAllLevels;
if not FindPickHeadColor then Logout;

  SetChat('on',1);
  SetChat('friends',2);
  SetChat('on',3);
  FixChat;
  SetChat('on',1);
  SetChat('on',3);

  if Players[CurrentPlayer].loc='Falador' then
    begin
     SetRun(true);
     BankToGuild;
    end

  if Players[CurrentPlayer].loc='Guild' then
    begin
      if(MapOreColor=0) then MapOreColor:=FindMapOreColor;

      if FindMMColor(x, y, LadderColor) then RoadWalk(MapOreColor);
      FFlag(10);

      MarkTime(Mark);
      repeat
          if(MapPickColor=0) then MapPickColor:=GetSymbolColor(x,y,'mining spot');
          FindRandoms;
          MyMine;
          Wait(100);
          if not FindColorTolerance(x,y,CoalOre, MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2,5) then ToCenter;
          if (not(Loggedin)) then  break;
      until(InventoryFull)or(NoPick=true)or(TimeFromMark(Mark)>1800000)

      SetRun(false);
      GuildToBank;
      Bank;
      ProgressReport;
    end;

  if ((LoggedIn) and (Players[CurrentPlayer].Banked mod Loads = 0) ) then
    begin
      MarkTime(Mark);
      SetChat('off',1);
      repeat
         Wait(1000);
         FindRandoms;
         if(TimeFromMark(Mark)>120000) then begin Logout; Break; end;
      until(not(LoggedIn));
      NextPlayer(True);
    end;
  if (not (Loggedin)) then  NextPlayer(False);  // Always the last line!

until(false)

end.
[/scar][br][size=1]Posted at: October 16, 2006, 10:57:41 PM[/size][hr]cmon som1 ne1???

Read full topic
item.source: [error]in this guild miner i got from another site help plz [error]
